resources.string: Before you start, please tell us your first name
Your name field is empty, are you nameless? It is impossible :O
Your name is too short, it should be at least 3 letters long!
Your name is a bit long, it should be max. 18 letters, if your name is actually more than 18, sorry you will surely find an abbreviation :D
I can\'t believe your name contains numbers or special characters :O
Your name sounds great B) You can move on
Return to the application and select or skip the break.
